segments.text: I observe the angled view of this busy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets stand open on the left wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar inside is full and tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stretches on a two-step stool to reach it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts back, adding thrill to his quest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He grabs cookies while balancing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, the girl holds out her hand expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly in on the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the sink, water flows freely from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin overflows, sheet after sheet hitting the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman polishes dishes, blind to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron hides the aproned figure in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view through the window is idyllic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet inside, mischief and mishap brew unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
